channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-47172|2024-09-30T14:38:03.959Z -- hasthemes -- shoplentor
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in HasThemes ShopLentor plugin <=Â 2.6.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-35699|2024-08-02T03:14:54.149Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20feed
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Feed allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Feed: from n/a through 1.2.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-38706|2024-07-15T20:28:14.726Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20mega
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Path Traversal.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.5.7.
